Description: Sandstone stela of an unnamed person; the gabled top is lost. There is a panel of Greek text above a cross within a wreath and a dove. Description from Hall: In a panel a dove with outstretched wings and medallion round its neck, on either side A and Ѡ. Above, cross pattée within wreath, medallions and spandrels of panel. Inscription above.
Bibliographic references: Hall 1905 / Coptic and Greek Texts of the Christian Period from Ostraka, Stelae, etc. in the British Museum (p.133, Pl.10)
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: I.Brit.Mus.Gr. I 94:6 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
